meanings.definition: In the ninth place or position.
meanings.sent1: Ninthly, she added the final touch to her painting.
meanings.sent2: He always arrives ninthly to our weekly meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat, ninthly, decided to nap on the highest shelf.
meanings.sent4: The sun set ninthly behind the mountains, painting the sky in hues of orange.
meanings.sent5: Ninthly, the runner crossed the finish line with a burst of energy.

meanings.definition: In the ninth order or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The ninthly book on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: He wore the ninthly colored tie to match his suit.
meanings.sent3: The ninthly cupcake in the display looked too delicious to resist.
meanings.sent4: Her ninthly attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The ninthly star in the constellation shone the brightest in the night sky.
